DOCNAME: CASE OF CUNHA MARTINS DA SILVA COUTO v. PORTUGAL
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Civil proceedings;Article 6-1 - Reasonable time);Violation of Article 13 - Right to an effective remedy (Article 13 - Effective remedy)
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE . The relevant details of the applications are set out in the appended table .
CARDINAL . The applicant complained of the excessive length of civil proceedings and the lack of an effective remedy in this respect .
